form.title: Title
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Here you can write as much as you want
form.pricePlaceholder: Help people know how much it will cost
form.rateTitle: Rate how much you want this gift

friends.findFriendPlaceholder: Type your friend username or name here
friends.deleteModalMessage: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.

share.title: Get this gift for your friend!
share.notSupported: Sharing is not available on this browser.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please try again later.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

eventForm.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 3 characters long
eventForm.titleTooLong: Title must be at most 30 characters long
eventForm.descriptionTooShort: Description must be at least 5 characters long
eventForm.descriptionTooLong: Description must be at most 500 characters long
eventForm.dateInPast: Your event can't be in the past

giftForm.titleMin: Title must be at least 3 characters long
giftForm.titleMax: Title must be at most 30 characters
giftForm.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 3 characters long. If you don't want a description, leave it empty!
giftForm.descriptionMax: Description must be at most 300 characters.
giftForm.priceInvalid: Price must be a positive number

profileForm.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 3 characters long
profileForm.nameTooLong: Name must be at most 30 characters long
profileForm.usernameInvalidCharacters: Only lowercase letters and numbers, no spaces
profileForm.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long
profileForm.usernameTooLong: Username must be at most 20 characters long
profileForm.ageTooYoung: You need to be over 18 to create an account.

questionForm.questionTooShort: Question must be at least 3 characters long
questionForm.questionTooLong: Question must be at most 100 characters long

answerForm.answerTooShort: Answer must be at least 3 characters long
answerForm.answerTooLong: Answer must be at most 100 characters long

signUpForm.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
signUpForm.maxLength: Password must be at most 30 characters long
signUpForm.uppercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
signUpForm.lowercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
signUpForm.numberRequired: Password must contain at least one number
signUpForm.specialRequired: Password must contain at least one special character
signUpForm.emailExists: User with this email already exists

logInForm.minLength: password must be at least 6 characters long
logInForm.maxLength: password must be at most 30 characters long
logInForm.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before logging in.

commentForm.minLength: Comment must be at least 3 characters long
commentForm.maxLength: Comment must be at most 300 characters long

form.title: Title
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Here you can write as much as you want

modal.deleteModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This is irreversible. The event will be deleted for ever.

secretFriend.startMessage: Wanna start a secret gift exchange assigment?
secretFriend.onGoingSecretFriend: There is an ongoing secret friend gift exchange. If you wanna be included, ask the organiser to restart.
secretFriend.flipCardMessage: Flip the card to see the secret friend!
secretFriend.everyoneNotIncluded: Not all guests are included in the secret friend, wanna restart?

profileSettings.logOutDescription: You can log out from here, but you'll need to log in again with your email and password.

signUpForm.passwordInstructions: Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
signUpForm.completedSignup: Account created! Check your email to activate your account.

confirm.confirmed: Account confirmed! Redirecting to home page...
confirm.error: There's been an error, please try again later.
confirm.expired: This link has expired or is broken, click below to get a new one.

form.description: Enter your email and we'll send you an email so that you can recover your account.

toast.emailSent: Recovery email sent! Check your email.

form.expired: Your password recovery link has expired. Click below to request a new one.
form.description: You can change your password here, but you'll need to log in again with your email and new password.

toast.updated: Password updated! Log in with your new password.
